preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 0.4 g of Boron powder. 
 2. Measure 0.2 g of Cadmium powder. 
 3. Measure 0.56 g of Nickel powder. 
 4. Measure 0.16 g of Yttrium powder. 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all measured powders thoroughly using a mortar and pestle until a uniform mixture is achieved.
